author: Paula Marantz Cohen
title: It’s the Era of Feelings, and Not Necessarily Good Ones
text:
What do the #MeToo movement and the election of Donald Trump have in common? Both are the result of a powerful emotional response. In the first case, women have sought retribution for being harassed or abused. In the second, a bloc of white working-class male voters have expressed anger at the direction of America’s economy and culture.
Both groups feel injured or overlooked—often in mutually exclusive ways. Indeed, that is the point. Strong feelings bring people into conflict. Rational discussion and institutions like the...
